subject: Missing DC cable
description_text:
﻿Hello Simsonn I just purchased your +X pedals from Amazon, and upon building I noticed I’m Missing a DC cable for the transmitter box. Do I need that cable?

Sent from my iPad

conversations.body_text: Hi Carlos Garcia,  Are you referring to the 24V DC power cable? That is only included when you purchase the VAM Pro motor package separately.

Yes I guess it’s that cable, I see the option on my transmitter box, but don’t know if I need that cable for my set up.

Sent from my iPad

>
Hi Carlos Garcia,   If you did not purchase the VAM Pro motor, you do not need the DC 24V power cable, as the USB cable alone is sufficient.
It was and the pedals work fine Carlos
